SEARCH
Package Model

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
Model.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartupPhase
public abstract class Phase extends Object
Abstract class representing a phase in the game engine. All specific phases (e.g., StartUp, Reinforcement, Attack) should extend this class. It manages command handling, controller access, and phase-specific command execution.
Author:
Shrey Hingu

    • handleCommand

      public void handleCommand(String p_inputCommand) throws CommandValidationException, IOException
      Handles a command entered by the user (no player context).
      Parameters:
      p_inputCommand - the command string
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the command is invalid
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • handleCommand

      public void handleCommand(String p_inputCommand, Player p_player) throws CommandValidationException, IOException
      Handles a command entered by a specific player.
      Parameters:
      p_inputCommand - the command string
      p_player - the player who issued the command
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the command is invalid
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • commandHandler

      private void commandHandler(String p_inputCommand, Player p_player) throws CommandValidationException, IOException
      Internal command dispatcher and validator. Parses the command, checks conditions, and delegates to appropriate handler methods.
      Parameters:
      p_inputCommand - the command string
      p_player - the issuing player (can be null)
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if command is invalid
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • cardHandle

      protected abstract void cardHandle(String p_inputCommand, Player p_player)
      Handles execution of card-based commands such as bomb, blockade, airlift, and negotiate.
      Parameters:
      p_inputCommand - the command string entered by the player.
      p_player - the player issuing the command.

      protected abstract void advance(String p_inputCommand, Player p_player)
      Handles the logic for the 'advance' command, which moves armies between countries.

      p_player - the player issuing the command.

    • saveMap

      protected abstract void saveMap(CommandHandler p_commandHandler) throws CommandValidationException
      Saves the current map to a file.
      Parameters:
      p_commandHandler - the command handler containing map saving parameters
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the save command is invalid

    • validateMap

      protected abstract void validateMap(CommandHandler p_commandHandler) throws CommandValidationException
      Validates the current map to ensure it is playable (e.g., connected graph, correct configuration).
      Parameters:
      p_commandHandler - the command handler containing validation parameters
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the map is invalid or the command is incorrect

    • assignCountries

      protected abstract void assignCountries(CommandHandler p_commandHandler) throws CommandValidationException, IOException
      Assigns countries to players randomly at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      p_commandHandler - the command handler used for input parameters (if any)
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the command is invalid
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during assignment

      Parameters:
      p_commandHandler - the command handler containing player setup instructions
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the command is invalid

    • showMap

      protected abstract void showMap() throws CommandValidationException
      Displays the current state of the map including continents and countries.
      Throws:
      CommandValidationException - if the command is invalid in the current context

      Throws:
